[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@aws-amplify/data-schema](./data-schema.md) &gt; [EntriesToRecordTuple](./data-schema.entriestorecordtuple.md)

## EntriesToRecordTuple type

Turns this:

```ts
type E = [
 ['keyA', 'valueA'],
 ['keyB', 'valueB'],
 ['keyC', 'valueC'],
]
```
Into this:

```ts
type R = [
 Record<"keyA", "valueA">,
 Record<"keyB", "valueB">,
 Record<"keyC", "valueC">,
]
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type EntriesToRecordTuple<T> = {
    [K in keyof T]: T[K] extends readonly [
        infer innerK extends string,
        infer innerT
    ] ? Record<innerK, innerT> : T[K];
};
```
